alert.note: Alert for Dent; Phelps; Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 3:02AM CDT until April 11 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Dent County in south central Missouri... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Missouri... Phelps County in east central Missouri... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 301 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fort Leonard Wood, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rolla... Fort Leonard Wood... Waynesville... St. Robert... St. James... Doolittle... Newburg... Edgar Springs... Devil`s Elbow... Lake Spring... Anutt... Bangert... Northwye... Lecoma... Jerome... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 155 and 169, between mile markers 171 and 174, and between mile markers 176 and 197. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
